Name: Coptic textile
Description: Two small fragments of textile. The motif are leaves in blue, cream, yellow, red and green on a purple ground with rosettes between. There is a border of rectangles in alternating colours of blue, yellow, green, red and cream on a green ground.Technique: tapestry with built up shapes and slits.Ends per inch (warp threads): 16.Picks per inch (weft threads): 144 approximately.
